name: 3D Bio City Infection - Zombie Plague Crisis
name_original: 3D Bio City Infection - Zombie Plague Crisis
description: Infection has spread across the city. Bio inc. is here! People have become zombies! The infected town won't save itself. Destroy them all in this zombie survival games!! Great fps zombie shooting games! Really cool exiting guns to use in your quest for destruction on the highway. Easy and fun to play, make the zombie run away. This infection bio war game is Not for kids.
